Class FLOAD

  • java.lang.Object
    • FLOAD

  • public class FLOAD
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class FLOAD to calculate the Fire Load. For input, the program requires: DRY(dry-bulb reading), WET(wet-bulb reading), a yes or no decision regarding ISNOW (snow on the ground), PRECIP (preceding 24-hour precipitation), WIND (current windspeed), BUO (yesterday's buildup index), and IHERB (current herbaceous stage of vegetation).
